title: Enhanced Hardware Info
description: A comprehensive Unreal Engine plugin that allows you to easily access detailed hardware, system, and network information
longDescription:
User Manual \ Playable Demo \ Discord


Enhanced Hardware Info is a powerful and user-friendly Unreal Engine plugin designed to provide developers with comprehensive access to vital hardware, system, and network information. With this plugin, you can fine-tune your games and applications for optimal performance across a wide range of devices and platforms.

Key Features:

  • Access detailed information about CPU, GPU, RAM, and OS, such as manufacturer, model, clock speed, and memory capacity.
  • Retrieve valuable network information, including ping and NetMode (Standalone, Server, or Client).
  • Simple and intuitive function library, making it easy to incorporate into your project without extensive coding experience.


By leveraging Enhanced Hardware Info, developers can better understand their end-users' hardware and system configurations, allowing them to tailor their games and applications for enhanced user experiences. This plugin also enables you to monitor and analyze performance metrics, helping to identify potential bottlenecks and optimize your project accordingly.


Get started with Enhanced Hardware Info today and take your game development to the next level!


Changelog

Version 1.1.0

  • Updated documentation to 1.1.0
  • Added GetAdapterInfo that provides additional netwrok information such as Adapter Name, ip address, mac address and DHCP state
  • Updated Blueprint content

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Comprehensive access to vital hardware, system, and network information
  • Retrieve detailed information about CPU, GPU, RAM, and OS
  • Obtain valuable network information, including ping and NetMode (Standalone, Server, or Client)
  • Easy-to-use function library for seamless integration with your projects

Code Modules:

  • EHWI_Plugin (Runtime)

Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 1

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms:

  • Windows


Important/Additional Notes:

  • The Enhanced Hardware Info plugin is focused on providing access to hardware and system information and does not provide performance optimization features directly. However, it can be used to analyze and understand the performance of your project on various hardware configurations.
  • For best results, ensure that your project is updated to the latest Unreal Engine version supported by the plugin.
